welcome.title: Web design, Onlineshops und Branding
welcome.description: Grow your business with a custom-designed website or online shop. We offer professional development, SEO optimization, and reliable maintenance. Get your quote today!

header.donationMessage: Please consider sponsering Masri Programmer projects

hero.title: Web Design, Online Shops, and Branding
hero.description: »For you, I start moving everything: From comprehensive advice to the development of tailor -made websites and online shops with the latest technology to unique branding, which makes your advertising measures and campaigns at most effective. In order for your success to remain sustainable, I offer continuous support, maintenance, ongoing optimization and sensible marketing. And all of this with minimal effort for you - for your maximum benefit! «

features.title: Rich in features, not in pricing.
features.description: Together we will turn your vision into reality – professionally, technically flawless, and with a clear focus on the needs of your customers. You will receive a shop that not only works, but also optimally showcases your brand and builds trust with your customers.

about.title: Let's Connect!
about.description: Hi there! I'm a Software Developer at Meinders & Elstermann GmbH & Co. KG, and I absolutely love what I do. My days are spent crafting and refining web applications, with a real focus on making them not just powerful and reliable, but also genuinely enjoyable and intuitive for users. (P.S. - Don’t forget to check out my projects and thoughts over at {blogLink}!) There's something incredibly satisfying about transforming complex ideas into visually appealing, user-friendly experiences. I'm always eager to learn and grow, constantly exploring the latest technologies and best practices on daily.dev to ensure my work is top-notch. For me, coding isn't just a job; it's a passion that drives me to continuously improve and take on exciting new challenges. I truly believe in the power of collaboration and am always ready to contribute my skills to a dynamic team. I'm excited about what the future holds in web development and would love to connect with fellow professionals or discuss how my experience can benefit your next project. Feel free to {contactLink}!

services.mainSubtitle: From concept to launch, we provide end-to-end services to build your powerful online presence and achieve your digital goals.
services.additionalSubtitle: We offer a range of supporting services to ensure your website's continued success, security, and growth.

landingPage.title: Landing Pages & Onepagers
landingPage.description: Capture leads and drive conversions with a single, highly-focused page. Perfect for marketing campaigns, product launches, or digital business cards.

businessWebsite.title: Corporate & Business Websites
businessWebsite.description: Establish your brand's credibility with a professional, multi-page website. Ideal for service providers, corporate firms, and organizations needing a comprehensive digital hub.

onlineShop.title: E-Commerce & Online Shops
onlineShop.description: Launch your digital storefront and sell products online. We build scalable e-commerce solutions from small boutiques to large retailers, complete with all necessary features.

maintenance.title: Website Maintenance
maintenance.description: Keep your site secure, updated, and running smoothly with our comprehensive maintenance packages for peace of mind.

seo.title: SEO Kickstart
seo.description: Optimize your site from day one with keyword research, on-page SEO, and Google Business Profile setup for better visibility.

copywriting.title: Content & Copywriting
copywriting.description: Engage your audience with professional, SEO-friendly content crafted specifically for your core website pages.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover the experiences of businesses we've partnered with.

marvinPiepjack.text: It's a pleasure working with Mo. He has fulfilled all my wishes perfectly and communication is first class. I really recommend him highly.

husseinKhashab.text: Masri Programmer created a modern and user-friendly website for my energy consulting business. The process was transparent, and my requests were implemented perfectly. I'm extremely satisfied with the result.

leaveReview.title: Share Your Experience
leaveReview.description: We'd love to hear your feedback! Click here to leave us a review on Google.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. Here are some of the most common things people ask.

projectFlow.question: What is the typical project workflow for a website or an online shop?

items: Initial meeting and description of your project via phone or Zoom, determination of the scope of services
You will receive a written offer from me
If necessary, brand workshop
If necessary, brand / logo design
Conceptualization as a basis and definition of all necessary parameters
Detailed planning of design, content, technology, and timeline
Technical adaptation and setup of the Content Management System (CMS) or online shop
Creation of screen design based on corporate design, specifications, and examples
Review and approval of the screen design
Responsive optimization to ensure optimal display on all devices
Creation / data migration of content in the CMS or online shop as agreed
Project acceptance
Launch — Your project goes online
Support and maintenance such as updates, adjustments, and promotional activities

answer.content: We will outline which services are relevant for you in our first conversation, which also serves as the basis for a proper offer.

selfMaintenance.question: Can you maintain and expand your website or online shop yourself?

answer.content: You can maintain and expand all content yourself. You will receive a thorough introduction from me beforehand. For websites, I use Vue.js with Laravel as a backend framework. If you do not want to handle the maintenance yourself, I can optionally take over this partially or completely for you.

Backups and updates require additional technical effort. This requires a certain level of expertise for most systems and should therefore preferably not be carried out independently. I am also happy to take on this task for you regularly and promptly as an option.

costs.question: What does a website or an online shop cost?

answer.content: The cost of a website or an online shop naturally depends on the scope of the project. To give you a meaningful overview, you can use the following empirical values as a guide:

items: Landing page (Onepager) with Weblication: 200 Euro - 2,800 Euro
Website: 600 Euro to 5,000 Euro
Online shop: 2,200 Euro to 4,000 Euro
Online shop with CMS: 2,200 Euro to 10,000 Euro (incl. website and blog)

newWebsiteNeeded.question: Do you need a new website or a new online shop?

answer.content: If your website or online shop is no longer technically and/or visually up to date, this question is usually easy to answer. But even a new website or online shop can be realized 'missing the point'. The classic weaknesses are outdated design, coding that no longer works on different devices, missing functionality or compatibility, and outdated, insecure software. If your business depends on your online presence and you make a living from it, there is no question that you should do everything possible to ensure that this important part works optimally for you!

ownershipWebsite.question: Is the website or online shop your property?

answer.content: Websites and online shops developed by me belong to you. If, for whatever reason, necessary, you can easily move to another provider. With other providers or inflexible modular systems, you are often dependent on the respective provider and may have to have a completely new website or online shop created in the event of a change. All graphics will be made available to you upon request, provided the rights allow it, and any necessary domains and software will be acquired in your name.

ownershipPrint.question: Is the created print advertising your property?

answer.content: For all final artwork / print templates created by me, you will receive a spatially and temporally unlimited right of use for your company from me.

duration.question: How long does it take until everything is finished?

answer.content: You can probably already guess the answer: It depends on the scope and my workload. To still offer you a few milestones, here is a rough estimate:

items: Small website: approx. 1 month
Classic website for a company: approx. 2 months
Small online shop: approx. 2 months
Extensive online shop: approx. 6 months
A brand design / logo: approx. 1 month

answer.content: From many years of experience, I can say that delays will almost always occur, and very often this is due to the delayed delivery of content or late feedback. As your project manager, I try to avoid this and am happy to serve as a 'reminder'. For large projects, it can help to bring in other service providers, such as a copywriter.

brandWorkshop.question: Why is a brand workshop useful?

answer.content: The brand workshop is for customers who do not yet have a concrete distinction for their brand and/or products or who want to optimize an existing brand design. Your success lies in the communication of your advantages, which is why we work together to develop your brand concept as the basis for all further solutions.

There are many offers on the market — why might you choose me? I have over 5 years of experience from many different projects and offer my customers a choice of 2 CMS and 3 online shops. The benefit for you is comprehensive knowledge and a high problem-solving ability. I have experienced every conceivable situation in projects, have seen many trends come and go, and know what works and what doesn't. This makes one very adaptable, also for future requirements.
To find out if we are a good match, you can get a first impression through my offer, my references, and my blog, which we can then refine in a personal conversation – I would be pleased.
My work can include most of these technologies or tools

items: Frontend:
React.js (inkl. Redux, Next.js), Vue.js (Vite)
JavaScript & TypeScript (ES6+), JSX, HTMX
HTML5, CSS3 (Tailwind, SASS, Bootstrap, LESS)
Backend & Tools:
Laravel, PHP (Yii2), Node.js / Express
SQL-MYSQL, NoSQL-MongoDB, Postman
NPM, Git/GitHub/Gitlab (inkl. Gitlab CI)
Testing: Jest, Cypress (TDD-oriented testing)
Linux-Dev-Stack: LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) Einrichtung und Wartung

answer.content: From many years of experience, I can say that delays will almost always occur, and very often this is due to the delayed delivery of content or late feedback. As your project manager, I try to avoid this and am happy to serve as a 'reminder'. For large projects, it can help to bring in other service providers, such as a copywriter.

clientContribution.question: What should you as a client provide?

answer.content: It is primarily your project, which has a major impact on the future of your company. So plan enough time for it. Your cooperation is needed for feedback, content, and further collaboration and is often underestimated. For example, with online shops with Wawi/ERP, a considerable amount of time can arise from coordination and data collection.

imageFormats.question: In what formats should images for the website and online shop be delivered?

answer.content: Photo motifs (landscapes, people, etc.) please as .jpg, isolated motifs please as .webp, and motifs with a lot of text or lines please as .gif or .webp. Logos if possible please as .svg or .eps. All image motifs preferably in wide format with a width of approx. 1800px.

hostingProvider.question: How do you find a suitable hosting provider?

content.value: for my clients; and for you as a customer, it is also more advantageous to not separate hosting and online services. But of course, I am very happy to advise you and select a suitable hosting offer for you and support you, if necessary, with the booking.

seoToDo.question: What should you do for SEO?

answer.content: Websites and online shops for my clients are fundamentally SEO optimized. With sufficiently well-written and structured content, you can continuously optimize your SEO. At any time, you can receive help and valuable tips from me if needed or take advantage of further services.

metaKeywords.question: Do I need to maintain <meta keywords>?

answer.content: Because it is asked from time to time: No! The meta tag 'keywords' has not been relevant for ranking in Google search since 2009.

accessibility.question: What should you consider regarding accessibility?

content.value: requires many companies to be digitally accessible by 2025. But does this specifically apply to your company?

answer.content: *The legislation states that companies that offer goods or services to consumers and end-users, have a total turnover of more than 2 million / year and at least 10 employees, must definitely align their websites for accessibility from June 28, 2025.

*The reverse conclusion is: Companies that offer their goods or services exclusively B2B or have a maximum total turnover of 2 million / year and fewer than 10 employees are exempt from the new regulations.

In principle, however, websites and online shops should be designed to be as accessible or low-barrier as possible. This makes sense for economic reasons alone. An accessible website goes hand in hand with a better user experience and can thus increase the conversion rate. I would be happy to advise you on this topic in more detail.
*All statements without legal guarantee.

responsiveDesign.question: Do my websites and online shops also work on mobile devices (responsive)?

answer.content: Actually, it has long been self-evident that websites and online shops function just as well on mobile devices as on stationary devices (desktops) or laptops with larger screens, and of course, this is also the case with the projects I manage.

Here too, there are differences in quality: An automatic adjustment to the device used can be designed using 'breakpoints', then it switches to a different view exactly from this point and for this device class, or it can be designed to be 'fluid'. 'Fluid' here means that device-independent adjustments are also taken into account, for example for different window sizes on a desktop. This results in fewer unsightly display errors even on larger screens, because no one knows how large or how small the browser window is used there.

footer.tagline: Happy to help, happy to share
footer.germanLaw: I recognize the norms and standards of the BSI IT-Grundschutz ( German Federal Office for Information Security ) and comply with them.
footer.germanPrices: All prices plus 19% VAT. I provide my services exclusively to businesses within the meaning of Section 14 of the German Civil Code (BGB). Consumers within the meaning of Section 13 of the BGB do not receive any services.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: This Privacy Policy explains the nature, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data (hereinafter referred to as "data") within our online offering and the associated websites, functions, and content, as well as external online presences, such as our social media profiles (hereinafter collectively referred to as "online offering"). (hereinafter collectively referred to as "online offering"). With regard to the terms used, such as "processing" or "controller", we refer to the definitions in Art. 4 of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

introduction.title: 1. Introduction and Contact Details of the Controller

content.text: We are pleased that you are visiting our website and thank you for your interest. Below, we inform you about how we handle your personal data when you use our website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified.

The controller for data processing on this website within the meaning of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is Mohamad Masri, Nettelbeckstraße 10, 26131 Oldenburg, Germany, Tel.: +49 – (0) 1763 -1579669, E-Mail: hallo@masri-programmer.de . The controller responsible for the processing of personal data is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of the processing of personal data.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection When Visiting Our Website

content.text: When you use our website for informational purposes only, i.e., if you do not register or otherwise provide us with information, we only collect data that your browser transmits to the page server (so-called "server log files"). When you visit our website, we collect the following data, which is technically necessary for us to display the website to you:

items: Our visited website
Date and time of access
Amount of data sent in bytes
Source/reference from which you came to the page
Browser used
Operating system used
IP address used (if applicable: in anonymized form)

content.text: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR on the basis of our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website. The data will not be passed on or used in any other way. However, we reserve the right to check the server log files subsequently if there are concrete indications of illegal use.

For security reasons and to protect the transmission of personal data and other confidential content (e.g., orders or inquiries to the controller), this website uses SSL or TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the string "https://" and the lock symbol in your browser line.

For hosting our website and displaying the page content, we use a provider who provides its services either itself or through selected sub-contractors exclusively on servers within the European Union.
All data collected on our website is processed on these servers.
We have concluded a data processing agreement with the provider, which ensures the protection of our site visitors' data and prohibits unauthorized disclosure to third parties.

To make visiting our website attractive and to enable the use of certain functions, we use cookies, which are small text files that are stored on your device. Some of these cookies are automatically deleted after you close your browser (so-called "session cookies"), while others remain on your device for a longer period and allow page settings to be saved (so-called "persistent cookies"). In the latter case, you can find the storage duration in the overview of your web browser's cookie settings.

If personal data is also processed by individual cookies we use, the processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR for the performance of a contract, in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR in the case of given consent, or in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR to protect our legitimate interests in the best possible functionality of the website and a customer-friendly and effective design of the site visit.
You can set your browser to be informed about the setting of cookies and decide individually on their acceptance or exclude the acceptance of cookies for certain cases or in general.
Please note that if you do not accept cookies, the functionality of our website may be limited.

Within the scope of contacting us (e.g., via contact form or email), personal data is collected. Which data is collected in the case of a contact form can be seen from the respective contact form. This data is stored and used exclusively for the purpose of answering your request or for establishing contact and the associated technical administration.

The legal basis for processing this data is our legitimate interest in responding to your request in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR. If your contact is aimed at concluding a contract, the additional legal basis for the processing is Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR. Your data will be deleted after the final processing of your request. This is the case if it can be inferred from the circumstances that the matter in question has been finally clarified and provided that there are no statutory retention obligations to the contrary.

The applicable data protection law grants you comprehensive rights as a data subject (rights of access and intervention) with regard to the processing of your personal data by the controller, about which we inform you below:

items: Right of access pursuant to Art. 15 GDPR;
Right to rectification pursuant to Art. 16 GDPR;
Right to erasure (“right to be forgotten”) pursuant to Art. 17 GDPR;
Right to restriction of processing pursuant to Art. 18 GDPR;
Right to notification pursuant to Art. 19 GDPR;
Right to data portability pursuant to Art. 20 GDPR;
Right to withdraw consent given pursuant to Art. 7 (3) GDPR;
Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority pursuant to Art. 77 GDPR.

content.text: IF, WITHIN THE FRAMEWORK OF A BALANCING OF INTERESTS, WE PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL DATA ON THE BASIS OF OUR OVERRIDING LEGITIMATE INTEREST, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT AT ANY TIME TO OBJECT TO THIS PROCESSING WITH EFFECT FOR THE FUTURE FOR REASONS ARISING FROM YOUR PARTICULAR SITUATION.

IF YOU EXERCISE YOUR RIGHT TO OBJECT, WE WILL STOP PROCESSING THE DATA CONCERNED. HOWEVER, WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO CONTINUED PROCESSING IF WE CAN DEMONSTRATE COMPELLING LEGITIMATE GROUNDS FOR THE PROCESSING WHICH OVERRIDE YOUR INTERESTS, FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS, OR IF THE PROCESSING SERVES THE ESTABLISHMENT, EXERCISE OR DEFENSE OF LEGAL CLAIMS.

IF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS PROCESSED BY US FOR THE PURPOSE OF DIRECT MARKETING, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME TO THE PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA CONCERNING YOU FOR THE PURPOSE OF SUCH MARKETING. YOU MAY EXERCISE THE OBJECTION AS DESCRIBED ABOVE.
IF YOU EXERCISE YOUR RIGHT TO OBJECT, WE WILL STOP PROCESSING THE DATA CONCERNED FOR DIRECT MARKETING PURPOSES.

duration.title: 12. Duration of Storage of Personal Data

content.text: The duration of the storage of personal data is determined by the respective legal basis, the purpose of processing and, if relevant, additionally by the respective statutory retention period (e.g., commercial and tax retention periods).

termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsConditions.description: These General Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to all contracts for services between Mohamad Masri (hereinafter referred to as "Masri Programmer") and its clients. By placing an order, the client agrees to these GTC. Deviating terms and conditions of the client are hereby rejected, unless Masri Programmer has expressly agreed to them in writing.

content.text: The following terms and conditions apply to all services provided by me, including consultations and recommendations. They apply to subsequent contracts in their currently valid version, even if no specific reference is made to them in individual cases.

Any changes to the terms and conditions will be communicated to the client in writing. The new terms and conditions are deemed accepted if the client does not object to them in writing. The client must submit their objection to me within 14 days of notification of the changes.
The terms and conditions of my client are not valid under any circumstances, even if I do not expressly object.

I provide my services exclusively to businesses within the meaning of Section 14 of the German Civil Code (BGB). Consumers within the meaning of Section 13 of the BGB do not receive any services. All prices are subject to statutory VAT.
Offers are always subject to change.

I reserve the right to make improvements or changes to the contractually agreed services, provided that these are reasonable for the client and do not cause any significant disadvantage to the client.
Orders are accepted with a written order confirmation by letter, fax or electronic order confirmation by email in accordance with the terms and conditions of these General Terms and Conditions.
Oral special terms and conditions require written confirmation to be effective.
After receiving the written order confirmation from the client, I start work and create a corresponding sample draft.

Websites are made available to the client for review and approval. After reviewing the draft, the client has the right to request changes or improvements, or (if the draft is absolutely not satisfactory) to request a second sample.
Any requests for changes beyond this will result in the additional costs being billed based on the agreed hourly or daily rate.
Delivery dates and deadlines must be agreed upon. If the client requests changes to the order after placing the order that affect the production time, the delivery time will be extended accordingly.
I will inform the client when the contractual service has been fully provided and can be accepted.

Upon receipt of the completion declaration, the client is obligated to accept the contractual work immediately and may not refuse it for design or artistic reasons. Within the scope of the contract, the client is free to design the work.

I will notify the client immediately of the completion of individual project steps (concept, design, functions). The client is obligated to respond to this notification within 48 hours. If no response is received within this time frame, the project step/result will be deemed accepted as per the contract.

The services provided shall be deemed to have been accepted in accordance with the contract without any express declaration and shall be invoiced if the client does not submit a declaration of acceptance within 10 working days of the completion declaration being sent (including in electronic form) and does not make any other statement.
I am entitled to withdraw from a contract with immediate effect if there is good cause. Termination must be in writing. Such good cause exists in particular, but not exclusively:

items: If, for reasons for which the customer is responsible, the execution of an order is further delayed or becomes impossible despite a written warning and a grace period of 10 working days.
If the customer, despite a written warning and a grace period of 10 working days, persistently violates material contractual obligations or material provisions of these Terms and Conditions.

content.text: In the event of such a justified withdrawal from the contract, I retain the right to the entire agreed fee.

The customer is entitled to withdraw from the contract for good cause. Withdrawal must be made in writing. Such good cause exists in particular if the customer can no longer reasonably be expected to continue the contract because I continue to violate essential contractual provisions despite a written warning and a grace period of 10 working days for remedial action.
The services already provided by me up to this point as well as other accrued costs must be paid in full by the customer, even in the event of a justified withdrawal.

If the customer terminates the contract without good cause, the customer is obligated to pay the agreed fee in full, in addition to the services already provided and the costs incurred up to that point. Due to my project-specific scheduling, the lost profit cannot be realized elsewhere in the short term.

If the customer terminates the contract without good cause before the start of the project, he is obligated by me, due to the project-related scheduling, to pay the profit that cannot be realized otherwise due to the short notice in the following proportions:

items: Termination not more than 14 days before the agreed project start: 100%
Termination not more than 30 days before the agreed project start: 75%
Termination not more than 60 days before the agreed project start: 50%

content.text: The client may only offset claims that are undisputed or legally established.
Payment must be made in three installments: 1st installment 30% upon contract award, 2nd installment 30% upon layout and/or concept approval, 3rd installment 40% upon project handover.
The agreed remuneration is due without deductions within 7 days of the invoice date in accordance with the applicable price list, individual offers submitted or special written agreements made.

I may charge interest at a rate of 6% above the current base interest rate of the European Central Bank per annum from the due date, and from the date of default. This does not affect the assertion of proven higher damages, nor does it affect the client's right to prove a lower charge in individual cases.

If the client defaults on payment, I am entitled to withhold my other services, without prejudice to my contractual claims. Any other rights provided for by law in the event of default remain unaffected.
Set-off or the exercise of a right of retention against my claims is excluded unless the counterclaim is undisputed or has been legally established.

Commissioning creative services from self-employed artists or publicists generally incurs fees from the Artists' Social Insurance Fund (KSK) according to its published rates. Whether the artist or publicist is insured under the KSK is irrelevant for the contribution obligation. The fees paid must be reported to the KSK by the client.
The client is obligated to provide the necessary data in a timely manner and in a format suitable for the contract. This includes, in particular, content to be entered for the websites to be created.

If I have provided the client with drafts and/or test versions, specifying a reasonable period of time for checking them for accuracy and completeness, the drafts and/or test versions shall be deemed approved upon expiry of the period, unless I receive a written request for correction.
The client is obligated to use my services exclusively for their intended purpose. They must refrain from any violation of legal regulations or any misuse.
The client shall indemnify me against any liability to third parties arising from the client's use of my services violating the rights of third parties or statutory provisions.

The client expressly guarantees that the content provided by him does not violate German law or his home law, which may differ from it, in particular copyright, data protection, and competition law. I am not obligated to review the content. The client hereby indemnifies me against any third-party claims for compensation based on the client's inadmissible content.

The client receives a spatially and temporally unlimited right of use for the internet for all commissioned design and development work (including graphics, photos, programming, and text), unless otherwise agreed. Rights of use for print, TV, and other media must be regulated separately.

I reserve the copyright as well as the rights to content, descriptions, and suggestions contained in concepts, manuscripts, source code, and presentations, regardless of their form. This applies even if a fee has been estimated and paid for them. This applies in particular if fees are charged for a non-binding presentation, training, or the like. These fees compensate for the time and expenses incurred and do not acquire the right to reproduce or use the presented content, etc.
All designs, implementation of the designs as HTML construct or program code, together with the granting of rights of use, constitute a single service.

The drafts, final artwork, source codes, and designs may not be altered, either in the original or in reproduction, without my express consent. Any imitation, even in part, is prohibited. A violation of this provision entitles me to demand a contractual penalty equal to twice the agreed remuneration. If no remuneration has been agreed upon, the usual remuneration according to the SDSt/AGD collective agreement for design services shall be deemed agreed upon.
The use of the work I create is exclusively for the client or their staff. Any use by third parties, especially the resale of my work, requires my written consent.
The client's suggestions or other collaboration have no influence on the amount of remuneration. They do not constitute co-authorship.
The forwarding of all documents and source codes in whole or in part as well as their publication, reproduction and distribution is prohibited without my consent.

All of my creative developments and design work (drafts, concepts, presentations, page design, navigation elements, source code for web design, etc.) are subject to copyright law. The provisions of copyright law apply even if the level of creativity required by Section 2 of the Copyright Act is not achieved.
The aforementioned rights of use shall only be transferred after full payment of the remuneration.

The scope of services is determined by the service descriptions applicable at the time of contract conclusion, the agreed prices or hourly rates, and the following provisions. My employees or vicarious agents are not authorized to enter into agreements that deviate from the service descriptions, the agreed prices or hourly rates, or these General Terms and Conditions, or to make any other special representations.

If I provide additional services (e.g., consulting or technical support), these will be invoiced based on my general hourly rates. If I provide the client with the services of a third party, e.g., a transmission provider, at cost, my obligation is limited to the fiduciary exercise of the rights and obligations arising from the contractual relationship with the third party. The client is obligated to indemnify me against all claims by the third party.

Within the framework of continuing obligations, I reserve the right to modify the subject matter of my services, particularly in technical terms, provided this is reasonable for the client while taking my own interests into account. I reserve the right to make other changes to the contract, including the content of my services, the applicable hourly rates, and these terms and conditions, provided that I notify the client of the change one month before it takes effect. If the client does not object to the notified change within this one-month period, the change shall be deemed approved.

I provide my services within the scope of existing technical and operational capabilities. I am not responsible for service interruptions or delays due to force majeure or other events that temporarily or permanently make my performance impossible or unreasonably difficult, unless I am at fault. Events in this sense include strikes and lockouts, technical failures at other operators of telecommunications systems, transmission paths, or networks, power outages, natural disasters, acts of violence by third parties, and government interventions.

If such events lead to a permanent impossibility or a permanent significant impairment of the service, both parties are released from the obligation to continue fulfilling the contract. If the service becomes only partially impossible, the client is entitled to reduce the contractual fees in accordance with the severity of the impairment.
I undertake to carry out the order with the greatest possible care, in particular to treat any templates, documents, samples, etc. provided with care.

To the extent I am obligated to provide a warranty, this will be done by repair, excluding all other warranty claims. If the repair fails (e.g., due to culpable impossibility), the client cannot assert a claim for damages, except in cases of intent or gross negligence, but can only demand a reduction in the price or, in the case of impossibility through no fault of my own, cancellation of the contract.
I would like to point out that third-party software products used (CMS, shop systems, plugins, etc.) may contain undetected malfunctions or security risks for which I assume no liability.

If I provide troubleshooting services based on a fault report and it turns out that either there was no fault or the fault was caused solely by the client, I am entitled to invoice the client for my time spent in accordance with the applicable hourly rate.

In principle, the display of an HTML website may vary depending on the operating system, device, resolution, browser, or settings used. Through standards-compliant programming and testing with the latest browsers, we strive to ensure correct or adapted display on most systems. Due to the multitude of variations, we cannot guarantee that a website or online shop will be displayed losslessly or exactly the same on all systems, devices, and browsers.
I am only liable for damages if I or my employees or other vicarious agents are guilty of gross negligence or intent.

To the extent I am liable for damages, my liability is in any case limited to the damage that I foresaw as a possible consequence of the breach of contract at the time of conclusion of the contract, or that I could have foreseen, taking into account the circumstances of which I was or should have been aware. In the case of continuing obligations, my liability is limited to the simple amount of the annual fee owed for the contractual service in question, but otherwise to the amount of my invoiced claim.
Under no circumstances shall I be liable for lack of economic success, indirect damages, consequential damages or damages resulting from third-party claims.
My service includes the creation of websites for retrieval from a web server. I assume no liability for server-related disruptions or system failures.

If I use software systems or components from other manufacturers, I am not liable for the quality, security vulnerabilities, or errors of this third-party software. In case of doubt, troubleshooting and error correction will be subject to a fee. This applies in particular to the use of free open source software or add-on modules.
I am not liable for damages resulting from the use of software that was not developed by me and refer to the warranty provisions of the respective software manufacturer.

The above limitations of liability also apply to my employees or other vicarious agents. I undertake to carefully select and instruct my employees or other vicarious agents. Beyond this, I am not liable for my employees or other vicarious agents.

I hereby inform the client that I may collect, process, use, and transmit their personal or company data to third parties, in accordance with the applicable legal provisions, to the extent necessary for the establishment and proper execution of the contractual relationship. [Please refer to the privacy policy](url enter here).

Connection data will be collected, processed, used, and transmitted to the extent necessary for the provision of my services, their invoicing or verification, or otherwise for contract execution. The client undertakes to inform third-party users of this and, upon my request, to confirm in writing that they have fulfilled this obligation. [Please refer to the privacy policy.](url enter here)

I undertake not to exploit or disclose to third parties any business and trade secrets or confidential information of the client and its clients that I learn about during my work for the client without the client's prior consent. The same applies to any documents and knowledge provided to the client.
Furthermore, the contracting parties agree to maintain confidentiality regarding the contents of the contract and knowledge acquired during the contract execution.
The obligation of confidentiality also applies beyond the termination of the contractual relationship.

The client agrees that I may, if necessary, display the graphics, websites, etc. created for him as references in a public gallery on my website or use them in other advertising materials as evidence of my work.
Publication of the URL of the client's website edited by me is permitted.

Unless otherwise agreed, I am entitled to place a reference on the client's website and provide a link to my website. This link will name the author/service provider 'Michael Hömke' and refer to his website (url enter here).

Any violation of the right to use my work as a reference or to be named and linked in the aforementioned context entitles me to compensation. Without proof of higher damages, the compensation shall amount to 100% of the agreed remuneration or the remuneration customary under the SDSt/AGD collective agreement for design services. The right to claim higher damages upon proof remains unaffected. The right to be named does not expire upon the end of the collaboration between me and the client. Rather, the aforementioned right remains in effect for the entire duration of the contractually agreed use; at least until the end of the use of the contractual object in any position or in its entirety.

To the extent legally permissible, the place of jurisdiction is Bad Freinwalde. This jurisdiction agreement applies only to commercial customers. This jurisdiction agreement applies equally to domestic and international customers.
Amendments or additions to this agreement are only valid if agreed upon in writing. This also applies to any amendment to this written form clause.

Should any provision of this agreement be or become invalid, or should the agreement contain a gap requiring filling, this shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions. The invalid provision or gap shall be replaced by a provision that comes closest to the economic purpose of the agreement and that would have been agreed upon by the parties had they known of the invalidity of the provision.
The current hourly rate is45.00 EUR / hour

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.p1: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, processing, distribution, and any type of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are permitted for private, non-commercial use only.
copyright.p2: The copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask you to notify us accordingly. Upon notification of any violations, we will remove such content immediately.

cookieBanner.title: Privacy Settings
cookieBanner.description: This site uses cookies and technologies from third-party companies that require consent. If you click on the "Accept all" button, these functions will be activated (consent). After giving your consent, we and the third-party companies concerned will process your data for various purposes. You can view further information in my {privacyLink}. You can revoke your consent at any time.

pricing.title: Professional Web Services Pricing
pricing.description: The cost of a website or an online shop naturally depends on the scope of the project. To give you a meaningful overview, you can use the following empirical values as a guide:
pricing.customizeYourPackage: Customize your package with these powerful additions.
pricing.landingPageExamples: Perfect for marketing campaigns, a single product/service, or a digital business card.
pricing.websiteExamples: Ideal for service providers, corporate sites, doctors, or restaurants needing multiple pages and a blog.
pricing.onlineShopExamples: Designed for businesses selling products online, from small boutiques to larger retailers.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: A single, focused page to capture leads or announce a project.

copywriting.title: Professional Content & Copywriting

performanceOptimization.title: Website Performance Optimization
performanceOptimization.description: Boost your site's speed and user experience. We optimize images, code, and caching for faster load times and better SEO rankings.

supportRetainer.description: For ongoing improvements and custom tasks. Pre-purchase a block of developer hours for new features, design tweaks, or technical support at a discounted rate.

emailAndDomain.title: Email & Domain
emailAndDomain.description: Your desired domain & email address - simple and professional.

pricingSummary.title: A Plan for Every Need
